Bind Fiery Imps

Summon Units:#2286 Fiery Imp x 5+[1/2 lvl]
The caster sacrifices blood slaves to summon and bind a few fiery imps. Imps are small and weak devils, but this kind is surrounded by hot flames and can throw darts of fire.
